article:
Do you know Lisa King?She is my good friend.She is  _  Australia.Her family  _  all in China now.Her  _  teaches English in No.2 Middle School.Her mother is an English teacher in that school, _ .Her brother,David,is a student in our school.He is learning Chinese.He often  _  us English and we usually teach him  _ .His parents are studying Chinese history.They like  _  very much.
Look,Mr King is sitting on the sofa .He is  _  a Chinese book.Mrs King is watching TV.David is washing  _  clothes.Where is Lisa?She is in the  kitchen .She is cooking.What a happy family it is!
